steps.title: Design System Colors
steps.text:
This activity shows examples of standard ResearchUI screens that have image layouts.

The layouts are defined in the JSON document 'Theme_Image.json'.

steps.title: Scrolling instruction screen
steps.text: Example with the image placed before the text and using default colors. The image style is `iconBefore` so it is layed out using aspectFit centered.

steps.title: Scrolling instruction screen
steps.text: Example with the image placed before the text. The top of the image is pinned to the margin (below the status bar).

steps.title: Scrolling instruction screen
steps.text: Example with the image placed before the text. The top of the image is pinned to the top of the screen (under the status bar).

steps.title: Put the phone in your pocket
steps.text: Example with an animating keystone image that is set to use a looping animation.
